title: David Byrne | Twitter Permanently Suspends Marjorie Taylor Greene's Personal Account: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the COVID pandemic growing more widespread than ever as our democracy is on the brink.

Then, David Byrne shares how he handled a COVID outbreak on his Broadway show, explains why New York wasn’t a desirable place to live in the ’70s and talks about releasing a book of his art.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
